description.en: Let the AI bot chat with the student to assess their knowledge.
description.nl: Een AI-aangedreven conversationele beoordeling waarbij studenten in dialoog gaan om hun kennis te demonstreren.

settings.description: The prompt for the conversational question. This instructs the AI conversation partner how to converse with the student and what role the AI should play. Leave empty for non-conversational questions.
The completion criteria for the conversational question. This instructs the AI lector when to stop the conversation. Leave empty for non-conversational questions. Use HTML <ul> and <li> to format.

prompt-placeholder.en: What concept do you want to discuss? For example, 'Explain the Pythagorean theorem'.
prompt-placeholder.nl: Welk concept wil je bespreken? Bijvoorbeeld: 'Leg de stelling van Pythagoras uit'.

completion-placeholder.en: When is the conversation complete? For example, 'When the student has given 2 correct answers'.
completion-placeholder.nl: Wanneer is het gesprek voltooid? Bijvoorbeeld: 'Wanneer de leerling 2 correcte antwoorden heeft gegeven'.
